thread.title: Ukraine prepares for another year of war - Video - CityNews Edmonton

title: Ukraine prepares for another year of war - Video - CityNews Edmonton
text: Edmonton The latest updates and breaking news, now available around the clock. Check back in with us at any time to find out what's happening, and always be the first to know. CityNews, Everywhere. An Alberta Family was found dead Tuesday, three days after they were last seen alive from. Emergency crews recovering Kelly and Laura Pelsma and their eight-year-old son Dylan along with their side-by-side from Lac Ste. Anne Tuesday. Edmonton police are investigating a suspicious death that occurred near the downtown core. Laura Krause speaks to community members who say crime has gotten worse in the area. Edmonton police say three adults are facing over a hundred charges stemming from what investigators say is one of the worst cases of abuse they've ever seen. Police are sharing very few details about whether a large discovery of gold during a Montreal firearms raid has any connection to the gold that went missing earlier from Pearson Airport. David Zura explains. 32m ago Itâ€™s been a year full of blockbuster movies like Barbie and Oppenheimer. Film Critic James Mackin ranks the top 10 of 2023. 2h ago The imminent dawning of a new year finds Ukraine still in the midst of war. Melissa Duggan with how the country is preparing for the next phase of battle. We all know about Barbie and Oppenheimer, but there are some other great movies that flew under the radar in 2023. Film Critic James Mackin helps build your holiday binge-watch list. 4h ago
